error.signature: FileNotFoundError: nvcc not found. Please ensure CUDA is installed

verdict.summary: CUDA compiler (nvcc) is not in PATH â€” CUDA toolkit not installed or not configured.

dead_ends.action: Installing nvidia-driver instead of CUDA toolkit
dead_ends.why_fails: The driver enables GPU compute but doesn't include nvcc or development tools

dead_ends.action: Adding a random path to PATH hoping it has nvcc
dead_ends.why_fails: Wrong CUDA version's nvcc may be incompatible

workarounds.action: Install the CUDA toolkit: apt install nvidia-cuda-toolkit or download from NVIDIA
workarounds.how: The toolkit includes nvcc, libraries, and headers

workarounds.action: Add CUDA to PATH: export PATH=/usr/local/cuda/bin:$PATH
